hero.subtitle: Healthy, chef-prepared meals made with locally sourced ingredients and delivered fresh across Sydney every week.

chef.label: Meet Your Chef
chef.name: Aun
chef.bio1: With a passion for bold flavours and wholesome cooking, Aun brings her love of Thai and Asian-fusion cuisine to every Fresh Prep meal. From crispy chicken katsu to fragrant curries, each dish is crafted with care using fresh, local ingredients.
chef.bio2: Follow along on her cooking journey for behind-the-scenes content, recipes, and the stories behind each dish.

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.subtitle: From our kitchen to your table in four simple steps.
howItWorks.chooseMealsDesc: Browse our weekly rotating menu and pick your favourites.
howItWorks.aunCooksDesc: Every meal is prepared from scratch using local, quality ingredients.
howItWorks.weDeliverDesc: Meals arrive fresh at your door, ready to heat and enjoy.
howItWorks.heatEatDesc: Simply reheat in minutes for a delicious, nutritious meal.

mealDetail.allergenWarning: Prepared in a kitchen that handles gluten, dairy, nuts, eggs, soy, and shellfish. Please contact us if you have specific allergy concerns.
